response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to own it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
